instruction: Create an email template to send a reminder to an important client.
output:
Dear [Name], 
 
This is a friendly reminder that [details of reminder]. 

It would be great if we could talk soon so that I can provide any necessary updates and we can discuss any further questions. 

Please let me know when it would be convenient for us to chat. 

Thank you for your consideration. 

Sincerely, 
[Your Name]
